WorkPlace.Name: Adecco
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Adecco er markedsleder, når det gælder vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger.
Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: 30 talented chefs for three-month position in Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you enjoy creating gastronomic experiences as well as high-quality dishes? Can you handle both the cold and hot sides? Do you love to cook and have a big impact on your work? And are you ready for a culinary summer at a high pace in a fun team in Copenhagen?

You will be part of a team of 30 chefs/caters in a three-month temporary position over the summer. Together you will be responsible for making delicious food, and beautiful dishes and keeping the creativity and hygiene at the top for our customer on Amager. The atmosphere in the team is great, the pace is high and the mood is top-notch - so you'll get a fun summer with 29 other food enthusiasts.

You will have changing working hours and work in 3-team shifts.

We would like you to:

  • Be a skilled chef, caterer, or similar
  • Be accurate and ensure all items are produced to specification
  • Have the ability to work unsupervised and detailed in a busy environment
  • Bring a positive attitude and aim to be the best team player
  • Enjoy the busyness and be good at maintaining an overview

You get:

  • 3 months permanent temporary position on Amager in Copenhagen - starting June 2022
  • Salary and supplements by the applicable collective bargain
  • Orderly working conditions under temporary positions
  • Pension policy according to current rules
  • An exciting and varied everyday work life in a vibrant setting
  • The opportunity to continue in temporary positions in other exciting companies in Copenhagen

Want to join the team? Do not hesitate to apply for the position. You apply by sending your CV via the "Ansøg"-button. We are regularly calling-in candidates for interviews.

If you have further questions, you are welcome to contact Pernille or Lasse by telephone at +45 3838 1250.
